snippet.title: Chromavaders Development Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Chromavader is an 80's-styled arcade puzzle shooter mashup.  Slowly but surely, it's getting better and better.

Play it right now on Windows, macOS, Linux, or web browsers!  https://corundum.games/chromavaders

Follow Corundum Games on Twitter at @CorundumGames and track development of the game!
